description: Milvus vector store with search capabilities

collection_name.info: Name of the Milvus collection to use.

uri.info: URI to connect to the Milvus server.

password.info: Ignore this field if no token is required to make connection.

primary_field.info: Name of the primary field in the collection.

text_field.info: Name of the text field in the collection.

vector_field.info: Name of the vector field in the collection.

drop_old.info: Whether to drop the old collection if it exists.

timeout.info: Timeout for Milvus operations in seconds.
